title: “Talai” Book Series
author: شهرفرنگ
summary: Talai (Golden) Book Series was a collection of simplified and abridged classics for kids published by Amir Kabir publication company in Tehran during the 1960s and 1970s. Their affordable price made them very popular among many children.  For many, these books were their first introduction to the world literature.
